divs: Sighting DetailsTaking a 2.5 Mile walk at 1115 P.M. to 1200 A.M.VERY UNUSUAL MOVEMENT AT HIGHSPEEDS.A UFOIt didnt move like a missile or a satellite or a plane.Amazement andintrigue.High speeds with radical angle turns and stops and sudden changes indirection.Went out of view.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around October 2nd 2002
Summary: Fast movement with radical changes in direction .
